name: Die Dreigroschenoper

Filming locations: Schauspielfrankfurt, Frankfurt am Main, Hessen, Germany

description: The Gangster Macheath secretly marries the daughter of beggar king Peachum. When Peachum finds out, he instructs the police chief Brown to arrest and hang Macheath. If not, all the beggars of Soho will disturb the upcoming coronat...
